example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (ADVP (AD 像是)) (NP (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-TPC (-NONE- *T*-1)) (QP-SBJ (CD 一) (CLP (M 张))) (VP (QP-PRD (ADVP (AD 上)) (QP (CD 百万) (CLP (M 元)))))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 健康) (NN 床组)))) (PU ，) (VP (IP-CND (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (ADVP (CS 一旦)) (VP (VV 拆封)))) (ADVP (AD 就)) (ADVP (AD 不)) (VP (VV 能) (VP (VV 退货)))))
example.arg: 像是 *OP* *T*-1 一 张 上 百万 元 的 健康 床组
